items.sentence: Don't speak to me about Tom. We're on bad terms.
Tom's father died from overwork three years ago.
Tom sends a birthday present to Mary every year.
Maybe I'd better tell Tom what needs to be done.
Tom asked if Mary and I were enjoying ourselves.
Tom and I'd never done that by ourselves before.
Tom and I don't do that by ourselves very often.
Tom said he was really glad Mary didn't do that.
Tom thinks doing that would be a very good idea.
Tom says he has something important to tell you.
Tom told everyone that he was afraid to do that.
Tom thinks that he's smarter than everyone else.
Tom told me he was very hungry when he got home.
Tom eventually found a way out of the situation.
Mary's husband is three years older than she is.
Mary bought herself three new dresses last week.
Everyone started hugging and kissing each other.
I have no idea where Tom learned how to do that.
I know that Tom has already finished doing that.
There's no set schedule that you need to follow.
